QuestData.Title: The Greater of Two Evils
QuestData.Description: We took Darkwhisper Gorge from the demons of the Burning Legion by force. We've held on to our territory pretty well so far, with one exception.$B$BWe recently lost the Gates of Sothann to a pit lord and his army. We cannot allow this to stand.$B$BUse this talisman when you're near him. You'll gain the powers of a flame ascendant temporarily. Make it count.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: The Burning Legion has no place here. This is Twilight land now.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Talisman of Flame Ascendancy and slay Garnoth, Fist of the Legion, at the Gates of Sothann in Hyjal.
QuestData.RewardText: Excellent work, $ndamus. We must show all would-be competitors that we are not ones to give up easily.
